rules.name: accurateBlockPlacement
rules.description: Client can provide alternative block placement.

rules.name: anvilRepairCostLimit
rules.description: Allows to choose the anvil repair cost limit
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 32767

rules.name: armorStandEditor
rules.description: Allows ArmorStand editing with Hoe
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: betterItemFrames
rules.description: Right clicking with a Phantom Membrane or Glass Pane on an Item Frame will make it invisible or fixed
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: blockStateSyncing
rules.description: Fixes block states in F3 debug mode not updating for some blocks.
extras: Works with cactus, sugar cane, saplings, hoppers, dispensers and droppers.

rules.name: carefulBreak
rules.description: Places the mined block in the player inventory when sneaking

rules.name: coarseDirtCraftingCompatibility
rules.description: Adds crafting compatibility for coarse dirt with all dirts type

rules.name: colorableShulkers
rules.description: Allows to dye Shulkers
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: commandLocatePlayer
rules.description: Allow you to locate player
validators: It has an accompanying command
It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: commandLookme
rules.description: Adds the /lookme command to rotate entities
validators: It has an accompanying command
It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: commandPlayerMe
rules.description: Deopped players can do /player on themselves
extras: and you can create Fake Player on themselves
If commandPlayer is set to False you can't create Fake Player on themselves
validators: It has an accompanying command
It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: commandSkull
rules.description: Allows to have access to the /skull command
validators: It has an accompanying command
It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: commandStats
rules.description: Allows to have access to the /stats command
validators: It has an accompanying command
It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: commandSwapitem
rules.description: Allows to have access to the /swapitem command
validators: It has an accompanying command
It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: commandTimebar
rules.description: Allows to have access to the /timebar command
validators: It has an accompanying command
It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: commandWaystone
rules.description: Allows to have access to the /waystone command
validators: It has an accompanying command
It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: craftableAmethysts
rules.description: Allows to craft amethyst clusters from amethyst block

rules.name: craftableBarrier
rules.description: Allows to craft barrier block
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: craftableBricks
rules.description: Adds reverse crafting of Prismarine, Prismarine Bricks, Bricks and Nether Bricks

rules.name: craftableCobwebs
rules.description: Allows to craft Cobwebs

rules.name: craftableColoredBlocks
rules.description: Allows to use colored blocks to craft other color variants

rules.name: craftableCorals
rules.description: Allows to craft Coral Blocks with 4 Coral Fans and Corals

rules.name: craftableDeadBushes
rules.description: Allows to smelt saplings to get Dead Bushes

rules.name: craftableDeepslateOres
rules.description: You can craft deepslate ore in smithing table

rules.name: craftableElytra
rules.description: Allows to craft Elytras

rules.name: craftableLargeFern
rules.description: Allows to craft Large Ferns

rules.name: craftableLight
rules.description: Allows to craft light block
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: craftableNetherWarts
rules.description: Allows to craft Nether Warts from Nether Warts Block

rules.name: craftablePlayerHead
rules.description: Allows to craft Player Head from any kind of head

rules.name: craftableQuartz
rules.description: Allows to craft Quartz from any kind of Quartz Block

rules.name: craftableRedSand
rules.description: Allows to craft Red Sand from Red Sandstone

rules.name: craftableRootedDirt
rules.description: Allows to craft rooted dirt

rules.name: craftableSand
rules.description: Allows to craft Red Sand from Sandstone

rules.name: craftableSculkSensor
rules.description: Allow to craft Sculk Sensor with endeperals and observers

rules.name: craftableShulkerShells
rules.description: Allows to craft Shulker Shells from Turle Shells and Popped Chorus Fruits

rules.name: craftableTallGrass
rules.description: Allows to craft Tall Grass

rules.name: craftableTuffAndCalcite
rules.description: Allows to craft Tuff and Calite

rules.name: crumbleConcrete
rules.description: Allow you to transform concrete to concrete powder filling a glass bottle
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: disableOPsCommandFeedback
rules.description: Disable Command Feedback for OPs level 1

rules.name: dragonEggRespawns
rules.description: Ender Dragon always spawns a new dragon egg
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: dynamicLight
rules.description: Holding a light source will light around the player
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: endermanNoGrief
rules.description: Reduced the blocks that an Enderman can hold

rules.name: fastRedstoneCrafting
rules.description: Adds fast crafting for Dispenser and Repeater

rules.name: floatingLadders
rules.description: Allows to place ladders under other ladders
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: ghastNoGrief
rules.description: Ghasts will no grief the world

rules.name: graves
rules.description: Create personal graves when the player dies
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: horseStats
rules.description: Right clicking while sneaking on a horse/donkey/mule, will display the stats of the mob in the chat
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: huskDropsSand
rules.description: Husks drop sand on death

rules.name: illusionersSpawnInRaids
rules.description: Allows illusioners to spawn in raids (It needs restart to turn it off)

rules.name: lastDeathCompass
rules.description: Allows to right click a compass to make it point towards the last death point
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: lavaSponges
rules.description: Sponges work on lava too, but they will burn

rules.name: moreWanderingTrades
rules.description: Adds more trades to the Wandering Trader
extras: Mini Blocks, TreeCapitator Axes and Silky Blockstate tools
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: pillagerLeash
rules.description: Allows to tie pillager with empty hands
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: placeablePlants
rules.description: Allows to place plants on all blocks with flat top surface
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: protectionStacking
rules.description: Allows to stack multiple protection types

rules.name: prunedPlants
rules.description: Allows to prune plants with shears
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: quartzCraftingCompatibility
rules.description: Adds crafting compatibility with all types of Quartz Block

rules.name: redSandstoneCraftingCompatibility
rules.description: Adds crafting compatibility with all types of Red Sandstone

rules.name: redcraft
rules.description: Portals in RedCraft2 area will link to redcraft2 dimensions
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: renewableSporeblossom
rules.description: Allows to use bonemeal on Spore blossoms
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: repairableAnvil
rules.description: Allow to repair anvil with iron ingot
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: reviveCoral
rules.description: Allow to revive dead coral with water bottle
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: ropes
rules.description: Allows to leash a rope beetween two fences
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: sandstoneCraftingCompatibility
rules.description: Adds crafting compatibility with all types of Sandstone

rules.name: silkyBlockstates
rules.description: Allows to mine a block keeping the blockstate if using a Silky Blocstate tool
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: sitAnywhere
rules.description: Allows to place saddles on the ground
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: slabToBlockCrafting
rules.description: Allows to use 2 slabs to craft the block back

rules.name: specialNameTags
rules.description: Adds many special Name Tags
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: spongeSqueeze
rules.description: Allow to squeeze and wet sponge on cauldron
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: stonecutterQuartz
rules.description: Adds stonecutter craftings for all types of Quartz Block

rules.name: stonecutterRedSandstone
rules.description: Adds stonecutter craftings for all types of Red Sandstone

rules.name: stonecutterSandstone
rules.description: Adds stonecutter craftings for all types of Sandstone

rules.name: stonecutterStone
rules.description: Adds stonecutter craftings for all variants of Stone

rules.name: stonecutterWood
rules.description: Adds stonecutter craftings for all types of Wooden Block

rules.name: treecapitator
rules.description: Allows to mine an entire tree mining a single block if using a TreeCapitator axe
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: unpackableIce
rules.description: Allow to unpack PackedIce & BlueIce using the stonecutter

rules.name: villagerLeash
rules.description: Allows to leash villagers
validators: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App

rules.name: zombieHorseSpawning
rules.description: Zombie horses can spawn in the world
extras: With halloween: it will spawn only during Halloween
